text: Oho Mong`a ka! Ruri efela U nkapesitse ka matla a puso le hona ho nthuta ho hong ka tlhaloso ea liketsahalo, – `Mopi oa maholimo le lefats’e! Ke Uena Mots’oalle Mots’ireletsi oa ka lefats’eng le bophelong Bo-tlang. A’ku etse hore mohla ke shoang, ke shoe joaloka ea inehetseng thatong ea Hau, U nkopanye le ba lokileng.”
